showScoreExcerpt: "...awash in sentimentality and drenched in wistful longings and wish fulfillment."
bwwExcerpt: As for the production, the staging by Michael Greif (“Dear Evan Hansen,” “Next to Normal”) and Schele Williams (“The Wiz”) feels, for all its intention of intimacy, contrived and unsurprising. For a while the cross-cutting of the three couples haunting each other is intriguing but soon Katie Spelman...
